title: 08/23/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 08/23/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin lays out the quarterback situation facing the 49ers and why they are in such a difficult spot heading into the 2021 season. He discusses the latest update on Dak Prescott’s shoulder injury and why the Cowboys should be concerned about the franchise star after signing him to a huge contract. He also tells you why he was right about Aaron Rodgers and wrong about Zach Wilson. Plus, former Patriots quarterback Matt Cassel joins the show to give his thoughts on who the starting quarterback should be in New England this season.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
